faq.question: What is K Bazaar Billing Software?
faq.answer: K Bazaar is a comprehensive POS (Point of Sale) billing software designed for retail businesses. It offers GST-compliant billing, inventory management, barcode support, and detailed business reports - all in one easy-to-use platform.

faq.question: Is K Bazaar GST compliant?
faq.answer: Yes, K Bazaar is 100% GST compliant. It automatically calculates GST for all transactions, generates GST-ready invoices, and provides reports that help you file your GST returns easily.

faq.question: Can I use K Bazaar on multiple devices?
faq.answer: Absolutely! K Bazaar supports multi-device usage. You can access your business data from desktop computers, laptops, and even mobile devices, keeping your business connected at all times.

faq.question: Do you provide customer support?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide 24/7 customer support. Our dedicated team is always ready to assist you with any queries, technical issues, or training needs. We also offer video tutorials and documentation.

faq.question: How secure is my business data?
faq.answer: Your data security is our top priority. K Bazaar uses advanced encryption, regular backups, and secure cloud storage to ensure your business data is always protected and accessible.

faq.question: Can I try K Bazaar before purchasing?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer a free demo so you can explore all features before making a decision. Contact our sales team to schedule a personalized demo for your business.
